topics.body:
"@SuperSupermario24":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b5188363687219b7000214#post_55b5188363687219b7000214
[bq="SuperSupermario24"]"@Sollace":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b5183863687258ae004c11#post_55b5183863687258ae004c11
(btw you don't have to use @code@ tags to properly use asterisks)
(just type it like this)
[bq]====*stuff*====[/bq](those == tags escape formatting)
(and yes they can escape themselves too which is how i was able to type that)[/bq]

Also note that you can format blocks like this

[==[== foo ==]==] -> foo

[==@[== foo ==]==]@ -> @foo@

You can also multiline them, so I can write in my giant blocks of terminal musings

@[==
liam@liam-Desktop:~/source/optipng-0.7.5$ src/optipng/optipng -o3 panties_and_stockings_for_rainbow_dash_full_size_by_jungleanimal-d4sihwg.png
** Processing: panties_and_stockings_for_rainbow_dash_full_size_by_jungleanimal-d4sihwg.png.1
11000x7189 pixels, 3x8 bits/pixel, RGB
Input IDAT size = 25961711 bytes
Input file size = 25964484 bytes

Trying:
zc = 9 zm = 9 zs = 0 f = 0 IDAT size = 25737213
zc = 9 zm = 9 zs = 0 f = 5 IDAT size = 23546250
zc = 9 zm = 8 zs = 1 f = 1 IDAT size = 21482058

Selecting parameters:
zc = 9 zm = 8 zs = 1 f = 1 IDAT size = 21482058
==]@

topics.body:
"@Sollace":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b529c56368722f21000783#post_55b529c56368722f21000783
I'll note that you still need to convert spaces into figure spaces so that SimpleTextile won't throw them out

@[==
  # normal spaces
  def self.default_filter
    @@default_filter ||= Filter.where(name: 'Default', system: true).first
  end

  # figure spaces
  def self.default_filter
    @@default_filter ||= Filter.where(name: 'Default', system: true).first
  end
==]@
